meanings.definition: A plant of the milkweed family with silky hairs on its seeds.
meanings.sent1: The silkweed in the garden swayed gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: Monarchs butterflies lay their eggs on silkweed plants.
meanings.sent3: The caterpillar thought the silkweed was a cozy blanket.
meanings.sent4: The field of silkweed looked like a sea of soft clouds.
meanings.sent5: The children collected silkweed pods to use in their art project.

meanings.definition: The silky fibers surrounding the seeds of the milkweed plant.
meanings.sent1: The silkweed fibers were used to stuff pillows in the olden days.
meanings.sent2: The monarch caterpillar feeds on the silkweed fibers.
meanings.sent3: The silkweed fibers tickled the gardener's nose as he worked.
meanings.sent4: The silkweed fibers danced in the wind like tiny ballerinas.
meanings.sent5: The silkweed fibers shimmered in the sunlight, creating a magical sight.
